title: Let’s Go!!
detail_text: <:th_ch0205/>Oooh~! A lot of people saw the picture we uploaded to social media-!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>It was a good picture, after all. Rina-chan’s board「Smile」<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>I can’t believe that out of all things to be left in the picture, it was me trying to drink from a water bottle while the lid was still on....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>Fufu, you really panicked at that time, right, Karin-san. ....Ah, we got a lot of comments....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>They’re saying that they want to watch more of our lives-!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>The same goes for me! I want to see more of everyone’s lives, and I also want people to see more of my live!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>It’s really encouraging to receive such warm words, doesn’t it<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>Then.... how about we all have another training camp during this winter break? Look, we’ve eaten a little too much since we had parties non-stop, so....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>Will we have Kanata-chan cook for us for the training camp again?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>Leave it to me~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>If we get this much power from everyone, then we can’t just sit still, huh. Let’s not let our guard down just because it’s the end of the year!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
